titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015.
A bill to reauthorize the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 182.
